channel.title: My first patch, suggestion and improvement
channel.description: Hi! This is my very first patch with axo :smile: inspired by a simple Nordmodular G2 (sounds different) i want an opinion from the expert, the delay section seems does not work, changing with reverb stompbox works... reverb in the effects section does not work. like in the NMg2, there is an oscillator with multiple and selectable waveform? ( nmg2_leadRC1.axp (9.3 KB) i can find it)

item.title: My first patch, suggestion and improvement
item.dc:creator: @urbanspaceman francesco
item.description:

item.title: My first patch, suggestion and improvement
item.dc:creator: @urbanspaceman francesco
item.description:
@urbanspaceman wrote:

Hi!
This is my very first patch with axo
inspired by a simple Nordmodular G2 (sounds different)
i want an opinion from the expert, the delay section seems does not work, changing with reverb stompbox works... reverb in the effects section does not work.

like in the NMg2, there is an oscillator with multiple and selectable waveform? (

Schermata 2015-08-16 alle 17.12.45.png1760x900 351 KB
nmg2_leadRC1.axp (9.3 KB) i can find it)

Read full topic
